concept.title: Legacy Through Leadership
concept.shortdesc: Legacy Through Leadership is an initiative created to engage multicultural alumni with current multicultural students.

ul.li: Providing students with career development strategies
Opportunities to speak on panels on campus

conbody.p: In order to stay up to date with information regarding this intitiative, it is important to keep your contact informaton up to date and check the calendars frequently for events that are ocurring.
